caption:
Table 3. Ablation study of our method on classification ac-
curacies (%). Key modules of the proposed method, includ-
ing the channel attention, the spatial attention, and the Grad-
CAM are compared. " " represents the module contained, 
otherwise "×". The best result is in bold.
